short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chromium extension to make snow fall on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just in time for the holiday season. I wrote some JavaScript many years ago to let snow fall on a SharePoint site. This one will work for any site, just click the snow button and away you go!
